name: 晶石-原石（暂无）
desc: 用于锻造的尚未洗练的晶石原矿。

name: 晶石-晶石（暂无）
desc: 用于锻造的具有多种功能的晶石。

name: Radiant Luxite
desc: Extremely rare Luxite with high quality and value.

name: North Mountain Luxite
desc: Rare crystal only found in North Mountain Mine. It can be used to enhance the Tactical Skills related to the King's Army in the Luxite Workshop.

name: Little Sorceress's special drink
desc:
An accidental product of the Beryl's Luxite experiment.

<style=brown>A gooey, bubbling drink. Although Beryl claims it is absolutely safe and harmless, you dare not drink it.</style>

name: Caramel doughnut
desc:
An accidental product of the Beryl's Luxite experiment.

<style=brown>Perhaps for Beryl, there is no clear boundary between cooking and doing Luxite experiments.</style>

name: Broken crucible
desc:
An accidental product of the Beryl's Luxite experiment.

<style=brown>At least the experiment did not blow out the roof of the workshop.</style>

name: Small dolls
desc:
An accidental product of the Beryl's Luxite experiment.

<style=brown>To alleviate loneliness, Beryl created some "friends" and tried to use Luxite techniques to make them alive.</style>

name: Luxite alloy
desc: Luxite alloy made through special techniques by the Union, which can be used in special forging formulas.

name: Luxite dust
desc: Byproduct of Luxite ore, which contains scarce energy and can be used as a material.

name: Scorching Luxite
desc: It's a kind of advanced Luxite used exclusively for the Radiant Grace Ritual in the Papal States of Rodinia.

name: Dye Contract
desc: A permit for trading Elaman's special dyes—a coveted route for many merchants and one of the most lucrative trades on this continent.
